answers.author: Sam Anselm
answers.text:
Most of our ED efforts are going towards retention right now, trying to keep the businesses we have.  Businesses love to locate near other successful businesses, so our efforts at ICSC over the past three years have been to highlight the businesses we already have that are doing well.  We put our promotional materials, including demographics, presentations, etc. onto flash drives to hand out at the booths for the past two years.
Target the specific businesses you want to recruit, and set up meetings with them at RECON as early as you can.  Then fill in the rest of your time between meetings visiting the other booths.

author: Gary Palmer
text:
I will taking my 3rd trip to the International Council of Shopping Centers convention in May 2011 to represent my Town and look to recruit select retailers.  
I am looking to streamline my approach and was wondering what other communities were doing to attract retailers to their communities?
Any advice or information would be greatly appreciated!
You can email direct:  gary.palmer@townoffarragut.org  
Sincerely,
Gary Palmer
